query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN subject IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as null_subjects,
  SUM(CASE WHEN subject IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_subjects
FROM questions WHERE isActive = 1
command:
